headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https://geosantara.com https://*.geosantara.com https://img.youtube.com https://i.ytimg.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com
